short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a search to task selection in OpenAir

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The task selection box on the timesheet page is changed to include a search box to allow easier selection when the list is long.

SOURCE CODE:
